name: Hello World!

name: Why did the edge server go bankrupt?
description: Because it ran out of cache.

name: Useful tools in your day-to-day
description: I like to listen to lo-fi music when I'm coding with a warm cup of tea. I try to make the experience as relaxing as possible. When I'm in a rut, I will seek out W3Schools for assistance, or ask my colleagues.
